content.question: When DNA replicates, each strand of the original DNA molecule is used as a template for the synthesis of a second, complementary strand. Which of the following figures most accurately illustrates enzyme-mediated synthesis of new DNA at a replication fork?

choices.label: A DNA replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the five prime to three prime template DNA is being continuously synthesized in the three prime to five prime direction, towards the replication fork. The complementary strand to the three prime to five prime template strand is being continuously synthesized in the five prime to three prime direction, towards the replication fork.

A DNA replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the  five prime to three prime template DNA is being synthesized in short fragments in the three prime to five prime direction, towards the replication fork. The complementary strand to the three prime to five prime template DNA is being continuously synthesized in the five prime to three prime direction, towards the replication fork.

A DNA replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the five prime to three prime template strand is being continuously synthesized in the three prime to five prime direction, towards the replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the three prime to five prime template strand is being continuously synthesized in the three prime to five prime direction, away from the replication fork.

A DNA replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the five prime to three prime template DNA is being synthesized in small fragments in the five prime to three prime direction, away from the replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the three prime to five prime template DNA is being continuously synthesized in the five prime to three prime direction, towards the replication fork.

content.answer: A DNA replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the five prime to three prime template DNA is being synthesized in small fragments in the five prime to three prime direction, away from the replication fork. The complementary DNA strand to the three prime to five prime template DNA is being continuously synthesized in the five prime to three prime direction, towards the replication fork.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
